00046   enum EdgeConditionKind 
00047   {
00048     eckUnconditional, 
00049     eckTrue,          
00050     eckFalse,         
00051     eckCaseLabel,     
00052     eckDefault,

00054     eckDoConditionFailed, 
00055     eckForallIndicesInRange,

00066   class CFGNode {
00068     SgNode* node; // Must be either a SgStatement, SgExpression, or SgInitializedName (FIXME: change this to just SgLocatedNode if SgInitializedName becomes a subclass of that)
00069 
00072     unsigned int index;
00073 
00074     public:
00075     CFGNode(): node(0), index(0) {}
00076     CFGNode(SgNode* node, unsigned int index = 0);
00077 
00079     std::string toString() const;
00081     std::string toStringForDebugging() const;
00083     std::string id() const;
00085     SgNode* getNode() const {return node;}
00087     unsigned int getIndex() const {return index;}
00089     std::vector<CFGEdge> outEdges() const;
00091     std::vector<CFGEdge> inEdges() const;
00096     bool isInteresting() const;
00098     bool operator==(const CFGNode& o) const {return node == o.node && index == o.index;}
00100     bool operator!=(const CFGNode& o) const {return !(*this == o);}
00102     bool operator<(const CFGNode& o) const {return node < o.node || (node == o.node && index < o.index);}
00103   }; // end class CFGNode

00107   class CFGEdge {
00108     CFGNode src, tgt;
00109     public:
00111     CFGEdge(CFGNode src, CFGNode tgt): src(src), tgt(tgt) { assert(src.getNode() != NULL && tgt.getNode() != NULL); }
00112     
00114     CFGEdge() {}
00115     
00117     std::string toString() const;
00119     std::string toStringForDebugging() const;
00121     std::string id() const;
00123     CFGNode source() const {return src;}
00125     CFGNode target() const {return tgt;}
00127     EdgeConditionKind condition() const;
00129     SgExpression* caseLabel() const;
00131     unsigned int computedGotoCaseIndex() const;
00133     SgExpression* conditionBasedOn() const;
00135     std::vector<SgInitializedName*> scopesBeingExited() const;
00137     std::vector<SgInitializedName*> scopesBeingEntered() const;
00139     bool operator==(const CFGEdge& o) const {return src == o.src && tgt == o.tgt;}
00141     bool operator!=(const CFGEdge& o) const {return src != o.src || tgt != o.tgt;}
00142 
00144     bool operator<(const CFGEdge& o) const {return src < o.src || (src == o.src && tgt < o.tgt);}
00145 
00146   }; // end CFGEdge

00153   class CFGPath {
00154     std::vector<CFGEdge> edges;
00155     public:
00156  // DQ (8/28/2006): This constructor causes a bug to be brought out in ROSE 
00157  // (in compiling this file using ROSE) see test2006_124.C for a smaller example.
00158     CFGPath(CFGEdge e): edges(1, e) {}
00159     // Merge two CFG paths
00160     CFGPath(const CFGPath& a, const CFGPath& b): edges(a.edges) {
00161       assert (!a.edges.empty());
00162       assert (!b.edges.empty());
00163       assert (a.edges.back().target() == b.edges.front().source());
00164       edges.insert(edges.end(),b.edges.begin(),b.edges.end());
00165     }
00166 
00167     //George Vulov 12/1/2010: We need a default constructor
00168     CFGPath()
00169     {
00170     }
00171 
00172     std::string toString() const;
00173     std::string toStringForDebugging() const;
00174     std::string id() const;
00175     // Get the head CFG node of the path
00176     CFGNode source() const {assert (!edges.empty()); return edges.front().source();}
00177     // Get the tail CFG node of the path
00178     CFGNode target() const {assert (!edges.empty()); return edges.back().target();}
00179     //Return the first non-unconditional edge's condition
00180     EdgeConditionKind condition() const {
00181       for (unsigned int i = 0; i < edges.size(); ++i) {
00182         EdgeConditionKind kind = edges[i].condition();
00183         if (kind != eckUnconditional) return kind;
00184       }
00185       return eckUnconditional;
00186     }
00187     // Return the case label of its first edge representing a case
00188     SgExpression* caseLabel() const {
00189       for (unsigned int i = 0; i < edges.size(); ++i) {
00190           SgExpression* label = edges[i].caseLabel();
00191           if (label != NULL) return label;
00192         }
00193       return NULL;
00194     }
00195     SgExpression* conditionBasedOn() const {
00196       for (unsigned int i = 0; i < edges.size(); ++i) {
00197           SgExpression* base = edges[i].conditionBasedOn();
00198           if (base != NULL) return base;
00199       }
00200       return NULL;
00201     }
00202     std::vector<SgInitializedName*> scopesBeingExited() const {
00203       std::vector<SgInitializedName*> result;
00204       for (unsigned int i = 0; i < edges.size(); ++i) {
00205         std::vector<SgInitializedName*> s_i = edges[i].scopesBeingExited();
00206         result.insert(result.end(), s_i.begin(), s_i.end());
00207       }
00208       return result;
00209     }
00210     std::vector<SgInitializedName*> scopesBeingEntered() const {
00211       std::vector<SgInitializedName*> result;
00212       for (unsigned int i = 0; i < edges.size(); ++i) {
00213         std::vector<SgInitializedName*> s_i = edges[i].scopesBeingEntered();
00214         result.insert(result.end(), s_i.begin(), s_i.end());
00215       }
00216       return result;
00217     }
00218     bool operator==(const CFGPath& o) const {return edges == o.edges;}
00219     bool operator!=(const CFGPath& o) const {return edges != o.edges;}
00220 
00222     bool operator<(const CFGPath& o) const {
00223       if (edges.size() != o.edges.size()) {
00224         return edges.size() < o.edges.size();
00225       }
00226       for (unsigned int i = 0; i < edges.size(); ++i) {
00227         if (edges[i] != o.edges[i]) {
00228           return edges[i] < o.edges[i];
00229         }
00230       }
00231       return false;
00232     }
00233 
00235         const std::vector<CFGEdge>& getEdges() const
00236         {
00237                 return edges;
00238         }
00239   }; // end CFGPath

00242   inline CFGPath mergePaths(const CFGPath& hd, const CFGPath& tl) {
00243     // Assumes the edges don't do anything too complicated with scopes
00244     return CFGPath(hd, tl);
00245   }
00246 
00248   inline CFGPath mergePathsReversed(const CFGPath& tl, const CFGPath& hd) {
00249     return mergePaths(hd, tl);
00250   }

00254   inline CFGNode cfgBeginningOfConstruct(SgNode* c) {
00255     return CFGNode(c, 0);
00256   }
00257 
00260   unsigned int cfgIndexForEndWrapper(SgNode* n);
00261 
00265   inline CFGNode cfgEndOfConstruct(SgNode* c) {
00266     return CFGNode(c, cfgIndexForEndWrapper(c));
00267   }
00268 
00270   inline CFGNode makeCfg(SgNode* start) {
00271     return cfgBeginningOfConstruct(start);
00272   }

00277   class InterestingNode {
00278     CFGNode n;
00279 
00280     public:
00281     InterestingNode(CFGNode n): n(n) {}
00282     std::string toString() const {return n.toString();}
00283     std::string toStringForDebugging() const {return n.toStringForDebugging();}
00284     std::string id() const {return n.id();}
00285     SgNode* getNode() const {return n.getNode();}
00286     const CFGNode& toNode() const { return n; }
00287     unsigned int getIndex() const {return n.getIndex();}
00288     std::vector<InterestingEdge> outEdges() const;
00289     std::vector<InterestingEdge> inEdges() const;
00290     bool isInteresting() const {return true;}
00291     bool operator==(const InterestingNode& o) const {return n == o.n;}
00292     bool operator!=(const InterestingNode& o) const {return !(*this == o);}
00293     bool operator<(const InterestingNode& o) const {return n < o.n;}
00294   };

00296   class InterestingEdge {
00297     CFGPath p;
00298 
00299     public:
00300     InterestingEdge(CFGPath p): p(p) {}
00301     std::string toString() const {return p.toString();}
00302     std::string toStringForDebugging() const {return p.toStringForDebugging();}
00303     std::string id() const {return p.id();}
00304     InterestingNode source() const {return InterestingNode(p.source());}
00305     InterestingNode target() const {return InterestingNode(p.target());}
00306     EdgeConditionKind condition() const {return p.condition();}
00307     SgExpression* caseLabel() const {return p.caseLabel();}
00308     SgExpression* conditionBasedOn() const {return p.conditionBasedOn();}
00309     std::vector<SgInitializedName*> scopesBeingExited() const {return p.scopesBeingExited();}
00310     std::vector<SgInitializedName*> scopesBeingEntered() const {return p.scopesBeingEntered();}
00311     bool operator==(const InterestingEdge& o) const {return p == o.p;}
00312     bool operator!=(const InterestingEdge& o) const {return p != o.p;}
00313     bool operator<(const InterestingEdge& o) const {return p < o.p;}
00314   };

00316   inline InterestingNode makeInterestingCfg(SgNode* start) {
00317     // Returns CFG node for just before start
00318     return InterestingNode(cfgBeginningOfConstruct(start));
00319   }
